creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,371); woman at left holding a mask and a fan in a blue and white gown and a blue hat with white plumes and pink flowers; woman in center holding a mask in a pink and green gown and a pink hat with green plumes and pink flowers; woman at right in a white and blue gown with a pink and black striped skirt, a brown fur collar, and a pink and black striped hat with white plumes
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Septième Cahier, 1 Février 1789
